name: rapidforge
description: Release is a self-hosted DevOps platform that automates environment creation, previews, and deployments with a focus on simplifying cloud-native workflows via UI or API.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create isolated development, staging, and production environments with a single command

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Deploy applications to Kubernetes clusters with automated configuration and scaling

features.title: Infrastructure As Code
features.description: Define environments using declarative configuration files for reproducible deployments

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor CPU, memory, and storage usage across all environments from a central dashboard

features.title: Secret Management
features.description: Store and inject environment variables and credentials securely into applications
